dialogue.line: Clyde - Hello General Douglas, do you have a moment?
General - Who are you?!
Clyde - Sir, I'm Clyde Sheppard and I need your help.
General - You need my help? Don't you think I have a lot to do?
Clyde - You'll see that this is has massive priority, sir!
General - Priorities are my country and my men.
Clyde - EXACTLY!!
General - Explain yourself! Be Quick!
Clyde - It's the ABADDON!! HE'S COMING!!
General - Who?!... Come on...
Clyde - He's a very powerful BEAST, I know it's hard to believe, but He's nothing like we've seen.
General - Hm...

option.text: 1) We need to STOP HIM, and your Army will allow us to do that.

dialogue.line: General - You're talking about sacrificing my men??
Clyde - If we let Him destroy our planet, there will be no Army left to sacrifice.

option.text: 2) I think you, Sir, are perfect to HELP me figure out some plan.

dialogue.line: General - We are an Army, how could we even help?
Clyde - You're respected, organized, authoritarian. People will listen to you all.

option.text: 3) You and your men should JOIN Abaddon's cause!

dialogue.line: General - What cause exactly? Come on...
General - Nothing?
General - I don't know man, you got me by surprise.
Clyde - So you believe me now?
General - Can't say... Not sure yet!

option.text: 1) We need to SAVE OUR PEOPLE, sir! They need us to do something...

dialogue.line: General - In this case, yes may have a point...
Clyde - They are the ones we need to look at!

option.text: 2) You'll be defending your COUNTRY, your FLAG, your PEOPLE.

dialogue.line: General - That's definately the most important for the Army!
Clyde - It's not just that, you're also PROTECTING our World!

option.text: 3) You will be defending a true GOD. Abaddon is coming to stay!

dialogue.line: General - Man, come on... You're not making sense.
General - Nothing?
General - Okay, man, I'll speak with the other Lieutenents. We'll comunicate our decision later.
Clyde - Thank you Sir!
